A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m sorry but I’ve lost all faith in Kennedy’s leadership of this franchise. Rian should be ashamed. This movie is the worst... it’s worse than the prequels if that were even possible. So what kilo is the main antagonist now...a kid that isn’t even that good in the force. No arc for Rey. Just an absolute travesty. I feel terrible for all those performers... Rian mucked everything up. My prediction is Rian loses his job and will not write the upcoming trilogy. No way. He’s ruined this trilogy and that will become apparent soon enough.
